overview: Gino, a bank executive is not having a good day. After giving birth to their eighth child, his wife insists that he have a vasectomy, something he doesn't even want to think about. On top of that, he discovers that other family members are stealing money from his bank.
tagline: Gino's wife has given him 8 beautiful children... and an ultimatum.
title: Vasectomy: A Delicate Matter
